data.name: Squarely Blue
data.detailed_description:
Squarely Blue is a minimalist puzzle game in which you try to make your way through each level by finding a path on a grid of tiles that disappear as soon as you leave them. The game's unique procedural generation system allows for a slowly increasing difficulty and an endless amount of fun puzzles to solve!

Features:
  • Infinite amount of randomly generated levels
  • Simple, minimalist graphics style
  • Fun but challenging puzzles

data.short_description: A minimalist puzzle game in which you try to make your way through each level by finding a path on a grid of tiles that disappear as soon as you leave them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 30 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 30 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to use the latest architecture.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 30 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Big Sur
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 30 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to use the latest architecture.

Minimum:
